tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
ALL PROCEDURES WERE ENTIRELY PAINLESS. COULDN'T ASK FOR MORE.

I was suffering from a recurring tooth pain in a previously root canal treated and capped tooth. I ignored this recurring pain for a long time as I was apprehensive in going through the traumatic procedure of dental treatment from whichever dentist I had visited earlier. On a casual discussion with a friend, he recommended me to see Dr. Hardik. Taking his advice I visited his clinic. 

Scheduling an appointment was a breeze.

Dr Hardik welcomed me with a pleasant smile and assured me it will be a painless procedure. He examined me very professionally and with the help of digital x-ray facility he quickly pinpointed the problem to a faulty previously done root canal which resulted in the root getting infected. He explained to me in detail what needs to be done and gave his best recommendations. During the course of the treatment which included re-root canalling medicating and curing the infected root and finally closing and capping with a new perfectly made crown, I could never feel any pain or discomfort.

I could see that with any procedure you take on, his goal is to make it as comfortable and painless as possible. He takes pride in what he does. Time management is impeccable as waiting period is very minimal. His clinic is up to date with all the latest technology and it is very clean. Dr Hardik gives a lot of importance to hygiene. Seeing this hygienic environment itself gives you a lot of confidence and assurance.

Again over the course of my treatment I learned that he is an expert in many procedures like Dental implants, tooth whitening and cleaning etc etc. In short, every procedures for a dental care are available is his clinic. Fees are reasonable and affordable. Dr Hardik is very caring, compassionate, and patient with a desire to make his patients happy with the results. If you need quality work, at an affordable price,¬†I would be very pleased to recommend his services all the time.
reply_text: Thank you Mr Jerome , for your kind words and appreciation. Me and my team put lot of efforts for any of the Patient who enters our clinic , right from Appointment , reminders , cleanliness ,etc.  We are humbled by your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came in to Smile Sensations for a root canal capping since the old one fell off and also for tartar removal. It was Dr. Cinderella who worked things out like a smooth operator. She totally knows what she needs to do and is also very sweet and humble at the same time. She explained each and every step and kept me prepared for what's next.Iam very Happy with the overall result of the capping and the way my teeth look now without the tartar..Thank you Doc..**** *** *** **** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I have known Dr. Hardik for quite some time now. I am quite happy with his treatment. He is a nice, friendly person and handles his patients with great care. He is a thorough professional and I would be very pleased to recommend his services to my family members and friends all the time. I wish him good luck and prosperity in his career.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and appreciation.

review: Dr. Hardik is a very experienced doctor. He is very deft with his hands. He walks you through the treatment very well in advance so you know what to expect. In the process he also gives you pointers and tips which helps you to identify if the treatment is done correctly or not. I had a very good experience being treated by him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Hardik has been my family's doctor for nearly 15 years which itself says that he is the best . All through the Covid  lockdown too he took care of my severe dental issues via the phone .

Very peaceful ,clean and well sanitized clinic with very courteous staff .

 Pain free dental care, courteousness, respectful, extremely professional and total transparency in explaining the treatment procedures .

 It is honest Doctors like Dr Hardik that makes one equate Doctors to God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: The doctor before proceeding with treatment gives an entire overview of the situation and asks for patients opinion on whether he/she wants to proceed. He gives the approximate costs that would be incurred to complete the process.. he is very professional too and also puts patients at ease.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
New to mumbai for an official trip, tht evening I was in search of best dentist to treat my tooth ache. Found SMILE DENTAL through google n reached Jst before closing time n saw Dr. HARDICK. He understood my situation, tht next evening was my flight to London. He even talked to my office explaining clearly to my manager. The next day morning he came an hour before His normal working hours Jst for me. Done with da treatment within 2hrs n I went to office for the briefing.

Very ethical and professional.
Thanks docüòä
